body:
The question is I use the **wrong layout** and I got the **wrong value** and **nil** 

```go
str :="2016-07-20 02:30:00"
fmt.Println(str)
tm6,err:=time.Parse("2006-01-02 15:04:06",str)
fmt.Println(tm6,err)
tm3,err:=time.Parse("2006-01-02 15:04:03",str)
fmt.Println(tm3,err)
tm2,err:=time.Parse("2006-01-02 15:04:02",str)
fmt.Println(tm2,err)

//resault
2016-07-20 02:30:00
2000-07-20 02:30:00 +0000 UTC <nil>
2016-07-20 00:30:00 +0000 UTC <nil>
2016-06-30 02:30:00 +0000 UTC <nil>
```
